Yezhegodnik Zoologicheskogo Muzeya Imperatorskoi Akademii Nauk

subSubSection.paragraph: Buchara orient. (Tabi-dara - Zagyrdescht, 2 [[ queen ]], 6 [[ worker ]], 17. VI. 1897. Kaznakov!); Ferghana (Montagne Transalai, Bachmir, 9000 ' h., 3 [[ worker ]], 3. VII. 1895. Korzinsku!); Ussuri merid. (Sidemi, 1 [[ queen ]], 30. VII. 1897. Jankovskij!); Chine occident. (Sze- tschwan, Lunganfu, gorge de Chodzy-gou, 6000 ' h., 1 [[ worker ]], VI. 1893. Berezovsku!; Maotsch-zou - Mataigi, 1 [[ queen ]], 27. VIII. 1893. Potanin!),
